title: Takata recall expanded, BMW 5-Series driven, BMW launches its diesels: What’s New @ The Car Connection
text: Lexus to offer hybrid version of LS luxury sedan When Lexus took the wraps off of its revamped flagship last week at the Detroit auto show, it did so without mentioning anything about a hybrid version—something that the brand has become associated with. Here's when the Chevrolet Bolt EV goes on sale in your state It's the vehicle that could...
